content: समीर् {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To shake, move, agitate, stir up, set in motion. {@--2@} To excite, rouse. {@--3@} ({%a%}) To send forth, emit; ({%b%}) To speak, utter; <ls>Ku. 2. 16.</ls> {@--4@} To cast, throw, toss. {@--5@} To raise or lift up. {@--6@} To accomplish, bring about. {@--7@} To bestow on, endow with.
